TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract DefaultWebOptions

summary.span: 包含 Microsoft Word 在将文档保存为网页或打开网页时使用的全局应用程序级属性。

span.span: Contains global application-level attributes used by Microsoft Word when you save a document as a Web page or open a Web page.

span.para: 您可以返回或设置应用程序 （全局） 级别或在文档级别的属性。请注意，属性值可以是不同到另一个文档，具体取决于属性值时保存文档。）将文档级属性设置将会覆盖应用程序级属性设置。将文档级特性包含在对象。
使用方法，以返回DefaultWebOptions对象。

You can return or set attributes either at the application (global) level or at the document level. (Note that attribute values can be different from one document to another, depending on the attribute value at the time the document was saved.) Document-level attribute settings override application-level attribute settings. Document-level attributes are contained in the object.
Use the method to return the DefaultWebOptions object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowPNG { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在将文档保存为 Web 页时，允许将 PNG (可移植网络图形) 作为图像格式。

span.span: True if PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is allowed as an image format when you save a document as a Web page.

summary.span: 假 如果不允许将 PNG 作为输出格式。

span.span: False if PNG is not allowed as an output format.

summary.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

span.para: 如果您保存为 PNG 格式图像和您的目标 Web 浏览器支持 PNG 格式，可能会提高图像的质量或减少图像文件的大小并因此减少下载时间。

If you save images in the PNG format and if the Web browsers you are targeting support the PNG format, you might improve the image quality or reduce the size of those image files, and therefore decrease the download time.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AlwaysSaveInDefaultEncoding { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果为true时保存网页或纯文本文档，并且独立于文件的原始编码打开时使用默认编码。

span.span: True if the default encoding is used when you save a Web page or plain text document, independent of the file's original encoding when opened.

summary.span: False如果使用的文件的原始编码。

span.span: False if the original encoding of the file is used.

summary.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

span.para: 属性可以用于设置默认编码。
The property can be used to set the default encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdBrowserLevel BrowserLevel { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdBrowserLevel get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdBrowserLevel value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置，表示要用来设定 Microsoft Word 中创建的新网页的 Web 浏览器的级别。

span.span: Returns or sets a that represents the level of the Web browser for which you want to target new Web pages created in Microsoft Word.

span.para: 上设置的BrowserLevel属性后对象，在 Word 中创建任何新网页的BrowserLevel属性将全局设置相同。
After you set the BrowserLevel property on the object, the BrowserLevel property of any new Web pages you create in Word will be the same as the global setting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckIfOfficeIsHTMLEditor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果 Microsoft Word 检查，以查看在启动 Word 时，Office 应用程序是否是默认的 HTML 编辑器。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word checks to see whether an Office application is the default HTML editor when you start Word.

summary.span: False如果 Word 不会执行此检查。

span.span: False if Word does not perform this check.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 使用 Web 浏览器支持 HTML 编辑和 HTML 编辑器时，才使用此属性。
若要使用不同的 HTML 编辑器，您必须将此属性设置为False ，然后将该编辑器注册为默认的系统 HTML 编辑器。
This property is used only if the Web browser you are using supports HTML editing and HTML editors.
To use a different HTML editor, you must set this property to False and then register the editor as the default system HTML editor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckIfWordIsDefaultHTMLEditor { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果 Microsoft Word 检查，以查看在启动 Word 时是否为默认的 HTML 编辑器。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word checks to see whether it is the default HTML editor when you start Word.

summary.span: False如果 Word 不会执行此检查。

span.span: False if Word does not perform this check.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 使用 Web 浏览器支持 HTML 编辑和 HTML 编辑器时，才使用此属性。
若要使用不同的 HTML 编辑器，您必须将此属性设置为False ，然后将该编辑器注册为默认的系统 HTML 编辑器。
This property is used only if the Web browser you are using supports HTML editing and HTML editors.
To use a different HTML editor, you must set this property to False and then register the editor as the default system HTML editor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
例如，如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: For example, if the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoEncoding Encoding { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoEncoding get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoEncoding value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置文档编码 (代码页或字符集) 若要查看保存的文档时 Web 浏览器使用。

span.span: Returns or sets the document encoding (code page or character set) to be used by the Web browser when you view the saved document.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FolderSuffix As String
public: property System::String ^ FolderSuffix { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回 Microsoft Word 使用时将文档保存为网页，使用长文件名，选择保存在单独的文件夹的支持文件的文件夹后缀 (即，如果和属性设置为True)。

span.span: Returns the folder suffix that Microsoft Word uses when you save a document as a Web page, use long file names, and choose to save supporting files in a separate folder (that is, if the and properties are set to True).

span.para: 新创建的文档使用由FolderSuffix属性返回的后缀对象。值属性对象可能不同于DefaultWebOptions对象的如果以前在不同的语言版本的 Microsoft Word 中编辑文档。您可以使用方法更改为您在 Microsoft Office 中当前正在使用的语言的后缀。
默认情况下支持的文件夹的名称是网页加上下划线 (_)、 句点 （.） 或连字符 （-） 和 word"文件"（显示的顺序文件保存为网页的 Word 版本的语言） 的名称。例如，假设您使用的 Word 荷兰语版本将名为"Page1"文件另存为网页。支持的文件夹的默认名称就是 Page1_bestanden。
下表列出每个语言版本的 Office，并提供了相应的属性值和文件夹后缀。对于表中未列出的语言，使用后缀".files"。

Newly created documents use the suffix returned by the FolderSuffix property of the object. The value of the property of the object may differ from that of the DefaultWebOptions object if the document was previously edited in a different language version of Microsoft Word. You can use the method to change the suffix to the language you are currently using in Microsoft Office.

By default, the name of the supporting folder is the name of the Web page plus an underscore (_), a period (.), or a hyphen (-) and the word "files" (appearing in the language of the version of Word in which the file was saved as a Web page). For example, suppose that you use the Dutch language version of Word to save a file called "Page1" as a Web page. The default name of the supporting folder is Page1_bestanden.

The following table lists each language version of Office and gives its corresponding property value and folder suffix. For the languages that are not listed in the table, the suffix ".files" is used.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Fonts As WebPageFonts
public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::WebPageFonts ^ Fonts { Microsoft::Office::Core::WebPageFonts ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回集合，代表字体 Microsoft Word 使用在 Word 中打开网页并没有在 Web 页中，指定字体信息或当前的默认字体无法显示网页中的字符集。

span.span: Returns the collection representing the set of fonts Microsoft Word uses when you open a Web page in Word and there is no font information specified in the Web page, or the current default font can't display the character set in the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OptimizeForBrowser { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果 Microsoft Word 优化新网页在 Word 中创建的 Web 浏览器指定属性 (的对象)。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word optimizes new Web pages created in Word for the Web browser specified by the property (for the object).

summary.span: True如果 Word 优化由指定的 Web 浏览器指定的网页属性 (的对象)。

span.span: True if Word optimizes the specified Web page for the Web browser specified by the property (for the object).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OrganizeInFolder { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果在将指定的文档保存为 Web 页时所有的支持文件，例如，背景纹理和图形，都组织在单独的文件夹。

span.span: True if all supporting files, such as background textures and graphics, are organized in a separate folder when you save the specified document as a Web page.

summary.span: 假 如果支持文件保存在与网页相同的文件夹中。

span.span: False if supporting files are saved in the same folder as the Web page.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

remarks.span:
新的文件夹网页的保存位置的文件夹中创建和文档之后命名。如果使用长文件名，后缀将添加到的文件夹名称。属性返回换句话说已选择或安装的语言支持的文件夹后缀或的默认文件夹后缀。
如果保存文档以前保存OrganizeInFolder属性设置为不同的值时，Microsoft Word 自动移动迁入或迁出文件夹，根据需要支持文件。如果不使用长文件名的
(也就是说，如果属性设置为False)，Word 自动将所有支持文件保存在单独的文件夹。这些文件不保存为网页的同一文件夹中。

span.para: The new folder is created in the folder where you have saved the Web page and is named after the document. If long file names are used, a suffix is added to the folder name. The property returns wither the folder suffix for the language support you have selected or installed or the default folder suffix.

If you save a document that was previously saved with the OrganizeInFolder property set to a different value, Microsoft Word automatically moves the supporting files into or out of the folder, as appropriate.

If you don't use long file names (that is, if the property is set to False), Word automatically saves any supporting files in a separate folder. The files cannot be saved in the same folder as the Web page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个对象，代表指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PixelsPerInch { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在 Web 页上图形图像和表格单元格的密度 (每英寸像素数)。

span.span: Returns or sets the density (pixels per inch) of graphics images and table cells on a Web page.

summary.span: 密度设置范围通常为 19 到 480，对于常用屏幕大小来说，密度一般设置为 72、96 和 120。

span.span: The range of settings is usually from 19 to 480, and common settings for popular screen sizes are 72, 96, and 120.

span.para: 在 Web 浏览器中查看保存的文档时，此属性确定图像和文本的大小指定网页上的单元格的大小。生成的图像或单元格的物理尺寸是原始尺寸 （以英寸为单位） 的结果乘以每英寸像素数。
使用属性为目标 Web 浏览器设置最佳屏幕大小。

This property determines the size of the images and cells on the specified Web page relative to the size of text whenever you view the saved document in a Web browser. The physical dimensions of the resulting image or cell are the result of the original dimensions (in inches) multiplied by the number of pixels per inch.
Use the property to set the optimum screen size for the targeted Web browsers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RelyOnCSS { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果您在 Web 浏览器中查看保存的文档时，字体格式使用级联样式表 (CSS)。

span.span: True if cascading style sheets (CSS) are used for font formatting when you view a saved document in a Web browser.

summary.span: Microsoft Word 创建的级联样式表文件，并将其保存到指定的文件夹或网页，具体取决于的值相同的文件夹属性。

span.span: Microsoft Word creates a cascading style sheet file and saves it either to the specified folder or to the same folder as your Web page, depending on the value of the property.

summary.span: False如果 HTML<字体>使用标记和级联样式表。

span.span: False if HTML <FONT> tags and cascading style sheets are used.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 如果您的 Web 浏览器支持级联样式表，因为这将为您提供较精确的布局和网页上的格式化控件并使其类似于更多文档 （即 Microsoft Word 中显示），您应将此属性设置为True 。

You should set this property to True if your Web browser supports cascading style sheets because this will give you more precise layout and formatting control on your Web page and make it look more like your document (as it appears in Microsoft Word).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RelyOnVML { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果不从将文档保存为 Web 页时，图形对象中生成图像文件。

span.span: True if image files are not generated from drawing objects when you save a document as a Web page.

summary.span: 假 如果生成图像。

span.span: False if images are generated.

summary.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

span.para: 您可以减小文件的大小不为您的 Web 浏览器支持矢量标记语言 (VML) 如果绘图对象生成图像。例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 支持此功能，并且您应将RelyOnVML属性设置为True ，如果您面向的此浏览器。您为 VML 图像将不会出现时不支持的浏览器查看保存启用该属性的网页。
不生成图像，如果您网页将使用您之前生成的图像文件，并保存文档的位置是不同的 Web 服务器上的页面的最终位置。

You can reduce file sizes by not generating images for drawing objects if your Web browser supports Vector Markup Language (VML). For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5 supports this feature, and you should set the RelyOnVML property to True if you are targeting this browser. For browsers that do not support VML, the image will not appear when you view a Web page saved with this property enabled.

Don't generate images if your Web page uses image files that you have generated earlier and if the location where you save the document is different from the final location of the page on the Web server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SaveNewWebPagesAsWebArchives { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True保存新的 Microsoft word 使用单个文件网页 （之前被称为 Web 存档） 的网页格式。

span.span: True for Microsoft Word to save new Web pages using the Single File Web Page (formerly known as Web Archive) format.

span.para: SaveNewWebPagesAsWebArchives属性设置不会更改任何已保存的网页的格式。若要更改其格式，您必须分别打开它们，然后使用方法，以便设置网页的格式。

Setting the SaveNewWebPagesAsWebArchives property won't change the format of any saved Web pages. To change their format, you must individually open them and then use the method to set the Web page format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoScreenSize ScreenSize { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoScreenSize get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoScreenSize value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置在 Web 浏览器中查看保存的文档时应使用的理想最小屏幕大小 (宽度乘高度，以像素为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the ideal minimum screen size (width by height, in pixels) that you should use when viewing the saved document in a Web browser.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTargetBrowser TargetBrowser { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTargetBrowser get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTargetBrowser value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回常量，代表文档的目标浏览器查看在 Web 浏览器中。

span.span: Sets or returns an constant representing the target browser for documents viewed in a Web browser.

span.para: TargetBrowser属性集属性，但BrowserLevel才重要如果属性设置为True。否则，它将被忽略。TargetBrowser属性，但是，不会忽略并且设置的所有 Web 文档或单个 Web 文档中的浏览器级别。

The TargetBrowser property sets the property, but BrowserLevel is only important if the property is set to True. Otherwise, it is ignored. The TargetBrowser property, however, is not ignored and sets the browser level for all Web documents or for a single Web document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UpdateLinksOnSave { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: True如果确保保存文档时包含最新的链接以网页保存文档前自动更新超链接和所有支持文件的路径。

span.span: True if hyperlinks and paths to all supporting files are automatically updated before you save the document as a Web page, ensuring that the links are up-to-date at the time the document is saved.

summary.span: False如果不更新链接。

span.span: False if the links are not updated.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 如果保存文档的位置的 Web 服务器上的最终位置不同，且支持的文件的第一个位置不可用，您应将此属性设置为False 。

You should set this property to False if the location where the document is saved is different from the final location on the Web server and the supporting files are not available at the first location.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseLongFileNames { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果您将文档保存为网页时使用长文件名。

span.span: True if long file names are used when you save the document as a Web page.

summary.span: 假 如果不使用长文件名和 DOS 文件名格式 (8.3) 用。

span.span: False if long file names are not used and the DOS file name format (8.3) is used.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

span.para: 如果您不使用长文件名，并且文档有支持文件，Microsoft Word 自动将组织在单独的文件夹的那些文件。否则，使用属性可以确定是否将支持文件组织在单独的文件夹。

If you don't use long file names and your document has supporting files, Microsoft Word automatically organizes those files in a separate folder. Otherwise, use the property to determine whether supporting files are organized in a separate folder.
